TopicTitle: Question: Where are the categories for subassemblies saved

Articles.Content:
I know the actual.craft files are saved in the saves folder with the other VAB models. But where is the information regarding categories for those models kept.

I like to keep my craft organized but when I cope over the game file to another instance of Kerbal these categories are never copied. I am wondering where that category information is saved?
Thankyou so much
Yeah, thanks.  Redoing the Subassembly custom categories after each update for all my various launchers and stages and stuff was a chore.
